item.content:encoded:
Install Newsroom Theme

Note:Â Newsroom uses is styled in sass. Thefore,Â hugo-extended versionÂ must be installed on your system.

Option 1: Add Newsroom as a git submodule

Add this theme as a Git submodule inside your Hugo site folder:

1

git submodule add https://github.com/onweru/newsroom.git themes/newsroom

Option 2: Add Newsroom as a hugo moduleÂ (Recommended)

In your config.toml file, setÂ themeÂ field value as follows

1

theme = ["github.com/onweru/newsroom"]

Then run

1

hugo mod init yourWebsiteName && hugo mod get -u .

Option 3: Install Newsroom into your theme directoryÂ (Least diserable)

From the root of your Hugo website run:

1

git clone https://github.com/onweru/newsroom themes/newsroom

In your config.toml file, setÂ themeÂ field value as follows

1

theme = "newsroom"
